archimate:Capability.name: Digital brand marketing
archimate:Capability.documentation: Digital Brand Marketing is a digital capability used to build and promote a brand to customers in the digital space, so that customerâ€™s perception of the brand can move from the initial stage where a customer is aware of the brand, all the way up to the final stage where the customer is loyal to the brand. This capability should be closely integrated with customer experience management in that a brand is built out of the result of customer experience. By definition, a brand is a collection of customer experiences with all levels of the organization that owns the brand.
